FuncDef:
The clock clock-id command configures a clock ID for a line clock source.
The undo clock clock-id command restores the clock ID for a line clock source.
The default clock ID is 0. If you have enabled the extended SSM function for a clock source, this clock source cannot participate in clock source selection.

ParaDef.Info:
Clock ID of a line clock source.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 15.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the extended SSM function is enabled and there is an intra-ring line clock source on the device that resides in both chain and ring networks or two ring networks, configure a clock ID for this line clock source to prevent clock loops.
If a clock ID has been configured for a line clock source, the device selects a clock source based on the configured clock ID. If no clock ID is configured for a line clock source, the device selects a clock source based on the interface-received clock ID.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
